/usr/bin/g++   -O3 -DNDEBUG     CMakeFiles/destin.dir/src/destin_mnist.cpp.o  -o bin/destin -rdynamic -larmadillo -lgfortran libdestinalt.so -larmadillo -lgfortran -lopencv_gpu -lopencv_contrib -lopencv_legacy -lopencv_objdetect -lopencv_calib3d -lopencv_features2d -lopencv_video -lopencv_highgui -lopencv_ml -lopencv_imgproc -lopencv_flann -lopencv_core -Wl,-rpath,/home/opencog/Desktop/Min/EM-DeSTIN/EMDestin
